name: S.O.S Call
description:
S.O.S Call is a very short horror game where you go to ship wrecks under a job where you find survivors of ship wrecks. As you rescue more survivors, you will find roaming aliens that dwell the ship wrecks. Learn to survive them to complete the mission.

As of current, the game is only a demo and is 1/3 way complete. It's not like it'll take a long time to make, probably 2 weeks if I work hard but this is just something I made in my spare time and not my passion project. Decided to put it up for the world to see, because why not?

The game (so far) is completable within 3 minutes if you're skilled enough but it might take people around 15 or 20 if they're still learning the mechanics.
